title: Guus Hiddink
summary: Guus Hiddink (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈɣys ˈɦɪdɪŋk] (listen); born 8 November 1946) is a Dutch former football manager and professional player. He enjoyed a long career playing as a midfielder in his native Netherlands, playing for sides such as PSV Eindhoven, De Graafschap and NEC Nijmegen, as well as some time spent playing in the United States. After retiring from playing the game in 1982, Hiddink went on to enjoy an illustrious career in management, leading both clubs and countries from across the globe to achieve various titles and feats, before calling an end to his coaching career in 2021.
